title: The Ghosts Forgive Scarlett | American Horror Stories - Episode 2: "Rubber (Wo)man - Part Two" (HD)
author: AHS Crave
comment: This feels like a parody omg
Ever since Apocalypse, the acting on this show....
Paris did better than I expected but Jesus Kaia I was hoping for better :(
Holy shit the acting is horrific
the acting is terrible. i feel like i’m watching a Disney channel show. i was expecting way better
description:
Scarlett (Sierra McCormick) declares her intentions to Ruby (Kaia Gerber) to leave the Murder House for good. Maya (Paris Jackson) & her friends forgive Scarlett for murdering them. 

American Horror Stories, the official American Horror Story spin-off series, is property of 20th Television, FX Networks, & Hulu - stream it now, exclusively on FX on Hulu.
